name: DarkTube + Youtube - RSD Companion Style
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
This is just a little companion style for style 117673 to add a little support for Youtube - Right Side Description! <3 WILL NOT LOOK RIGHT ALONE MUST USE DARKTUBE ALONG WITH IT!

user.name: CodyMKW
user.about: Hey my name is Cody I’m 31 years old I like to play Nintendo games, and I’m a former member of the retired Splatoon team known as Squids Next Door my favorite game series are Mario Kart, Animal Crossing, and Splatoon.
